item.description:
Neptune Web, Inc. has graciously offered to host our next Boston PHP Meetup. This will be held in conjuction with the Boston Red Hat Meetup Group and BostonPHP users group. We're hoping to gain critical mass and formalize a (L)AMP organization much like http://www.NYPHP.org.... Hope to see you there.

Directions by MBTA Subway
Take the Red Line to the Davis Square stop.
Follow the signs for the College Ave. exit. At street level, there are doors straight-ahead to the left. Take the doors on the left.
Turn left. This street is not named, but is marked "For Buses Only".
Walk to the end of the block with Davis Square behind you. The brick building to your left is 48 Grove Street. The entrance is at the end of the block.

For more information, see http://www.neptuneweb...
item.name: Boston PHP Meetup January Meetup
